org.apache.storm.hbase.security

クラス AutoHBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.storm.hbase.security.AutoHBase
  • すべての実装されたインタフェース:
    Shutdownable, IAutoCredentials, ICredentialsRenewer, INimbusCredentialPlugin

    public class AutoHBase
extends Object
implements IAutoCredentials, ICredentialsRenewer, INimbusCredentialPlugin

    Automatically get hbase delegation tokens and push it to user’s topology. The class assumes that hadoop/hbase configuration files are in your class path.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • prepare

        public void prepare(Map conf)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: ICredentialsRenewer

        Called when initializing the service.

        定義:
        prepare インタフェース内 IAutoCredentials
        定義:
        prepare インタフェース内 ICredentialsRenewer
        定義:
        prepare インタフェース内 INimbusCredentialPlugin
        パラメータ:
        conf - the storm cluster configuration.

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        定義:
        shutdown インタフェース内 Shutdownable

      • populateCredentials

        public void populateCredentials(Map<String,String> credentials,
                                Map conf)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: INimbusCredentialPlugin

        Method that will be called on nimbus as part of submit topology. This plugin will be called at least once during the submit Topology action. It will be not be called during activate instead the credentials return by this method will be merged with the other credentials in the topology and stored in zookeeper.

        定義:
        populateCredentials インタフェース内 INimbusCredentialPlugin
        パラメータ:
        credentials - credentials map where more credentials will be added.
        conf - topology configuration

      • populateCredentials

        public void populateCredentials(Map<String,String> credentials)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: IAutoCredentials

        Called to populate the credentials on the client side.

        定義:
        populateCredentials インタフェース内 IAutoCredentials
        パラメータ:
        credentials - the credentials to be populated.

      • getCredentials

        protected Object getCredentials(Map<String,String> credentials)

      • updateSubject

        public void updateSubject(Subject subject,
                          Map<String,String> credentials)

        Called to update the subject on the worker side when new credentials are recieved. This means that populateSubject has already been called on this subject.

        定義:
        updateSubject インタフェース内 IAutoCredentials
        パラメータ:
        subject - the subject to optionally put credentials in.
        credentials - the credentials to be used.

      • populateSubject

        public void populateSubject(Subject subject,
                            Map<String,String> credentials)

        Called to initially populate the subject on the worker side with credentials passed in.

        定義:
        populateSubject インタフェース内 IAutoCredentials
        パラメータ:
        subject - the subject to optionally put credentials in.
        credentials - the credentials to be used.

      • addTokensToUGI

        public void addTokensToUGI(Subject subject)

      • getHadoopCredentials

        protected byte[] getHadoopCredentials(Map conf)

      • renew

        public void renew(Map<String,String> credentials,
                  Map topologyConf)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: ICredentialsRenewer

        Renew any credentials that need to be renewed. (Update the credentials if needed)

        定義:
        renew インタフェース内 ICredentialsRenewer
        パラメータ:
        credentials - the credentials that may have something to renew.
        topologyConf - topology configuration.

      • getCredentialKey

        protected String getCredentialKey()

                 throws Exception
